author: gstein
msg: Convert some uses of loggy_copy over to OP_FILE_INSTALL.
(eval_conflict_func_result): rather than calling loggy_copy(), set a
source path, and break out of the switch. in one case, we generate a
temp file which needs to be removed after the installation. add logic,
based on REMOVE_SOURCE, to manage this. and lastly, outside the
switch, make use of the INSTALL_FROM to do the working file install.
